roleset.name: sinking awkwardly

example.name: cause as argument
example.text: Free State Glass Industries of Warrenton , Va. , a small fabricator of architectural glass , was foundering under its original management .

propbank.arg: Free State Glass Industries of Warrenton , Va. , a small fabricator of architectural glass

example.name: cause as adjunct
example.text: The sporty coupe foundered in part because American buyers did n't go for the car 's unusual double - wing rear spoiler .

propbank.arg: in part because American buyers did n't go for the car 's unusual double - wing rear spoiler

roleset.note: FOUNDER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'founder' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Bungling. (from founder.01-v predicate notes)
